definition.text: Block paragraphs defines set of paragraphs that can be inclided from other pages. When you include a block by creating a Docs Include Style paragraph, you need to reference a Block paragraph created at the page that have the set of paragraphs to be inclided. A Block contains all the paragraph after itself until the next Block or the end of the page.

paragraphs.text: To correctly ddefine an Block Paragraph, you need to follow the following syntax:
Block Name: This refers to any name that you would like to give to the newly created Block. The name must be unique within the page.
